With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Qi Deficiency with anorexia, loose stools and vomiting.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and strengthens the Spleen.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.
With Zhi Gan Cao, for Spleen and Heart Deficiency causing facial edema, palpitations and shortness of breath.

With Dang Shen, for anorexia, fatigue and loose stools due to Spleen Deficiency.
With Dang Shen, Fu Ling and Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and augments Qi.
Harmonizes the transportive and transformative functions of the Middle Jiao to treat anorexia, distention, fullness, lethargy, spontaneous sweating and restless fetus.
With Fu Ling and Zhi Gan Cao, for Spleen and Stomach Qi Deficiency.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, descends Qi, relieves the diaphragm, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
With Bai Zhu, for anorexia and other symptoms of Damp Obstruction due to Spleen Deficiency.
Transforms turbid Dampness, harmonizes the Middle Jiao, awakens the Spleen and promotes the movement of Qi.
With Dang Shen and Bai Zhu, for diarrhea with Spleen Deficiency.
